sentences.en: a comparison of men's salaries with those of women
Any comparison that is not strictly factual runs the risk of being interpreted as subjective.
sentences.cn: 任何不完全切合实际的比较都有可能被当作主观臆断。

sentences.en: By comparison with London, Paris is small.
sentences.cn: 与伦敦相比, 巴黎较小.

sentences.en: Comparison with other oil-producing countries is extremely interesting.
sentences.cn: 与其他石油生产国作一比较是很有意思的。

sentences.en: He came off well by comparison with the others.
Her paintings invite comparison with those of the early Impressionists (= they remind you of them ) .
sentences.cn: 她的画作让人想起早期的印象派作品。

sentences.en: I think these books can stand comparison quite happily with works by Dickens.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些书能和狄更斯的作品相媲美。

sentences.en: I'll just cite some figures for comparison.
sentences.cn: 我要引用一些数字作比较.

sentences.en: Is the human heart weak in comparison with the other organs?
sentences.cn: 与其他器官相比，人的心脏是不是很脆弱？

sentences.en: My garden doesn't stand comparison with his.
sentences.cn: 我的花园无法和他的相比.

sentences.en: That comparison isn't as wide of the mark as it seems.
sentences.cn: 那种比较并非像看起来那么离谱。

sentences.en: The comparison of her life to a sea voyage simplifies her experience.
sentences.cn: 把她的人生比作一次海上航行不足以说明她丰富的经历。

sentences.en: the Prime Minister's support staff is tiny in comparison with that of a US President.
sentences.cn: 与一位美国总统的辅佐班子比起来，辅佐首相的工作人员算是少的。

sentences.en: The rest of the arts scene looks increasingly turgid by comparison.
sentences.cn: 比较而言，艺术界的其他领域看起来越发索然无味。

sentences.en: There is no comparison between the two.
There is no comparison between them.
This dress is really cheaper by comparison.
sentences.cn: 比较起来,这件衣服确实便宜.

sentences.en: Those places are modern by comparison with Tresillian.
sentences.cn: 与特西利安相比，那些地方很现代。

phrases.tran_cn: 比较购物；采购条件的比较调查

trans.tran_en: the process of comparing two or more people or things
